description.narrative: By 2018, program management and coordination are effective., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Education â€“ General, Environmental Sustainability, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2018, 100 per cent girls/boys of primary school and 70% girls/boys of 1st cycle of secondary school, particularly the most vulnerable, achieve quality and inclusive education, and 100% girls/boys and adolescents out of formal school benefit from alternative education.

description.narrative: 96 per cent of UNICEF-funded activities were completed that benefited 27,908 children (13,357 girls and 14,551 boys) who received a package of services that allowed them to attend school. | Status:Met | As-of Date:04/02/2020
